name: Shillong Cherry Blossom Festival 2024
description: Join us for the much-anticipated Cherry Blossom Festival, a dazzling celebration that has rapidly blossomed into North East India's premier commercial event! Each year, this vibrant festival attracts international stars and showcases a unique blend of culture and creativity, captivating audiences from near and far up to 30,000 per day.

name: Jo Bolta Hai Wohi Hota Hai Ft. Harsh Gujral
description: It takes exemplary courage to sit in the first two rows of a Harsh Gujral`s show because he will get you with his highly witty yet charming style.

name: Karan Aujla - It Was All A Dream
description: Experience the magic of Karan Aujla live on his It Was All A Dream World Tour! Get ready for a night of sensational music as he performs his biggest hitsx
